Package purejavahidapi

Interface Summary
DeviceRemovalListener An InputReportListener gets called when a USB device is un-plugged.
HidDevice Instances of HidDevice represent a single physical USB HID device that has been opened for communication.
HidDeviceInfo HidDeviceInfo instances represent all that be found out about a specific connected USB HID device without actually opening it.
InputReportListener An InputReportListener gets called from background thread attached to a HidDevice every time an input report is received from the tha associated USB device.
 

Class Summary
PureJavaHidApi PureJavaHidApi class is the entry point to access USB HID devices.
